sql.trim: order_id as orderId, product_id as productId, user_id userId, rec_name recName, rec_phone as recPhone, rec_provice as recProvice, rec_city as recCity, rec_area as recArea, rec_address as recAddress, price , status, ordertime , paytime ,

mapper.insert: insert into orders( order_id , product_id , user_id , rec_name, rec_phone , rec_provice, rec_city, rec_area, rec_address, price , status, ordertime , paytime ) values ( #{orderId}, #{productId}, #{userId}, #{recName}, #{recPhone}, #{recProvice}, #{recCity}, #{recArea}, #{recAddress}, #{price}, #{status}, #{ordertime}, #{paytime} )
mapper.update: update orders set status=#{status}, paytime=#{paytime} where order_id=#{orderId}
